i m a student.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing?
I am doing well! It is my day off work so I am just relaxing.
That sounds nice. I am getting ready to move to a new house this weekend.
Oh that is exciting! Do you have a lot to pack?
Yes, I have a lot of books to pack. I am an avid reader and I have a large book collection.
That is cool. I like to read too, but I do not have a large collection.
Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I will be cooking a feast for my family. I love to cook and I am excited to try out some new recipes.
That sounds delicious! I love to cook as well, but I do not have the time to do it as often as I would like.
I understand. I am lucky to have a lot of free time on the weekends.
I am looking forward to moving into my new house. I think it will be a great place to relax and read my books.
That sounds wonderful. I am sure you will enjoy your new home.
Thank you! I hope you have a great weekend.
